imdb.plot outline: There is a place, in a top secret location, where chefs test their mettle. Ingredients are pushed to the limit. Breakthrough techniques are forged. It's here where culinary warriors prepare for battle, and a great chef becomes Iron Chef. The new series Cook Like an Iron Chef carries on the legend and takes you out of 'Kitchen Stadium' and into the secret proving grounds of Iron Chef Mike Symon. Get unprecedented access to his creative thought process and technique as he takes on a "secret ingredient" to hone his skills and create new recipes showcasing the unique, daring and delicious food you've grown to love from the best Iron Chefs and Challengers alike. From his private kitchen, Chef Symon will arm you with an arsenal of dishes that deliver perfect 10's for taste, presentation, creativity and use of the 'secret ingredient' to help you do battle for the discerning judges at your own kitchen table. And who knows, with Cook Like an Iron Chef it could be you preparing to do battle as the Next...Iron Chef.
imdb.title: Cook Like an Iron Chef
akas: Cook Like an Iron Chef (United States)
plot: There is a place, in a top secret location, where chefs test their mettle. Ingredients are pushed to the limit. Breakthrough techniques are forged. It's here where culinary warriors prepare for battle, and a great chef becomes Iron Chef. The new series _Cook Like an Iron Chef_ (qv) carries on the legend and takes you out of 'Kitchen Stadium' and into the secret proving grounds of Iron Chef Mike Symon. Get unprecedented access to his creative thought process and technique as he takes on a "secret ingredient" to hone his skills and create new recipes showcasing the unique, daring and delicious food you've grown to love from the best Iron Chefs and Challengers alike. From his private kitchen, Chef Symon will arm you with an arsenal of dishes that deliver perfect 10's for taste, presentation, creativity and use of the 'secret ingredient' to help you do battle for the discerning judges at your own kitchen table. And who knows, with _Cook Like an Iron Chef_ (qv) it could be you preparing to do battle as the Next...Iron Chef.::Geoffrey Campbell
